    • Constructor Detail

      • Tower

        public Tower​(int type,
             int intxLocation,
             int intyLocation)
        Takes in the type of tower and the tower location. Loads the tower from a csv file based on type. Saves properties to local variables.
        Parameters:
        type - The Tower type to load.
        intxLocation - The X coordinate of the Tower.
        intyLocation - The Y coordinate of the Tower.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(states.Game game)
        Update method gets called every game loop. Either finds new enemy or attacks currently targeted enemy
        Parameters:
        game - The Game State.

      • render

        public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Renders tower image to screen every game loop.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object used for drawing to the screen.
